title: Hour 1 - Deshaun Watson Suspension Appealed, Mike Florio
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Deshaun Watson Suspension Appealed, Mike Florio
description:
Dan reacts to the biggest stories in the NFL, including the NFL looking for a harsher punishment than a 6-game suspension for Deshaun Watson. Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio joins Dan to break down the Miami Dolphins tampering scandal. Plus, the Big Ten is looking to take over more media markets.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
